content: As a middle aged white male I don’t recognise this behavior as part of my culture, and I do not ask for more, ever. I am not from the US, never been there. My wife, a black African born in Africa, never lived in the US either, asked for more, more of everything, at every opportunity. So perhaps you should just put a fence around the US. We can all look in and marvel at the odd ways and cultural practices practiced.
